item.description:
let's meetup at johnny d's in somerville's davis square to see the roots/reggae band, pressure cooker, and kick off the labor day weekend with some great music.

read about pressure cooker here and here.

listen to some of pressure cooker's music on their web site.

looking forward to seeing you on friday night!


notes:

  • johnny d's cover charge is usually $10
  • parking in davis square can be an adventure, so allow extra time. (also, see this parking map.)
  • this is a joint meetup with the Metro-Boston Active Beer meetup group; see here.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll email a cell # to everyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 4 September, 5 p.m.
item.name: Pressure Cooker @ Johnny D's
